dstm2

Class Thread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • dstm2.Thread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Thread
extends java.lang.Thread
    The basic unit of computation for the transactional memory. This class extends java.lang.Thread by providing methods to begin, commit and abort transactions. Every Thread has a contention manager, created when the thread is created. Before creating any Threads, you must call Thread.setContentionManager to set the class of the contention manager that will be created. The contention manager of a thread is notified (by invoking its notification methods) of the results of any methods involving the thread. It is also consulted on whether a transaction should be begun.
    See Also:
    ContentionManager

      • setContentionManagerClass

        public static void setContentionManagerClass(java.lang.Class theClass)
        Establishes a contention manager. You must call this method before creating any Thread.
        Parameters:
        theClass - class of desired contention manager.
        See Also:
        ContentionManager

      • setAdapterClass

        public static void setAdapterClass(java.lang.String adapterClassName)
        set Adapter class for this thread
        Parameters:
        adapterClassName - adapter class as string

      • validate

        public static boolean validate()
        Tests whether the current transaction can still commit. Does not actually end the transaction (either commitTransaction or abortTransaction must still be called). The contention manager of the invoking thread is notified if the onValidate fails because a TMObject opened for reading was invalidated.
        Returns:
        whether the current transaction may commit successfully.

      • getTransaction

        public static Transaction getTransaction()
        Gets the current transaction, if any, of the invoking Thread.
        Returns:
        the current thread's current transaction; null if there is no current transaction.

      • getContentionManager

        public static ContentionManager getContentionManager()
        Gets the contention manager of the invoking Thread.
        Returns:
        the invoking thread's contention manager
